## Education/Work Background

I'm currently a graduate student at UMass Amherst's Data Analytics and Computational Social Science program. I received a Bachelor of Arts degree in Psychology with a minor in Literary and Cultural Studies, and a Post-Graduate Diploma in Interdisciplinary Studies and Research from FLAME University, India. I learnt Python in some courses I'd taken, and have some experience with SQL and Java NetBeans from high school too.  

## R experience

I've taken the Coursera courses 'The Data Scientist's Toolbox' and 'R Programming' before joining DACSS.

## Research interests

Public Opinion Dynamics, Behavioral Data, Networks, Community Psychology
